step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Keep your elbows close as you begin to raise them.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you spread them wide.
Excellent job sliding your hands behind your head and spreading your elbows wide. This is the peak of the stretch.
You're holding the position well. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Great job reversing the motion and returning to the starting position. You're completing the exercise smoothly.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close as you raise your hands and then spread them wide behind your head. This helps stretch your shoulders and chest effectively.
